I was hoping to learn about your favorite foods.

content: Yes, either works fine.

content:
Being brave enough to try different foods
is being brave enough to try different ways of life.
I tried my best...{短暂停}but let's talk about that later.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-1004夙夜_选项闲聊

content: Oh? Well then, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>food</color> do you usually prefer?
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-1004夙夜_选项闲聊
闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-1004夙夜_选项闲聊

content:
I've had this kind of food at local restaurants before.
The elders always said "no salt means no strength,"
It's not that I can't eat it. But I guess I can do without it too.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-1004夙夜_选项闲聊

content:
So this must be what they call
being a "good eater",
surprisingly {短暂停}impressive.

content:

I was thinking of referencing...
Maybe another time, {短暂停}we'll talk about it later.

content: ...Indeed, I haven't learned anything else either.

content:
Salty? I understand that - too much makes you thirsty.
Umami? I can't quite distinguish it yet,
But I can confirm that, as food, it must be something no longer living.

content: Yes! I like it!
